about_the_game:
Poetry Tuber is an east Asia culture-based interactive wallpaper app.

This app's virtual character(poetry tuber) will read ancient Chinese poetry and express the past masterpiece poetry words on your desktop, with selected beautiful background wallpaper.

Apart from work and study, I hope this app could bring you leisure and tranquility. Get a hint of inspiration and aftertaste in the intersection of ancient and modern philosophies.

Main Features
1 Selected poetry from Tang and Song Dynasty, dynamic poetry words shown on the desktop.
2 Vivid Chinese style live 2d characters, original created.
3 AI-driven poetry reading, the unique local language(such as sichuang and dongbei dialogue).
4 Mouse Effect, dynamic background.
5 Setting panel, personal setting.
6 Autofit screen size ratio with 16:9, 21:9, 32:9, 4:3, max resolution support 4k

Future Plan
1 More Poetry Tuber Character(Demo has one poetry tuber)
2 More default ancient Chinese poetry
3 User define poetry library and voice
4 Effect Library, background style
5 And more

System Required
Win 10 64bit, not support 32bit system.
Preliminary testing of WIN11 is available.
